vastu_comments.general_advice: Ensure that the main entrance is oriented towards the east or north as per Vastu guidelines. Bedrooms should be placed in the southwest quadrant for better energy flow, while common areas and kitchens are ideally located in the northeast corner to promote prosperity.

eco_features: Use of natural lighting through floor-to-ceiling windows
Sound insulation in private gym for energy conservation
